onboarding.location.title: Accurate Prayer Times
onboarding.location.description: To provide precise prayer schedules and Qibla direction, please allow location access. Your data is kept private.
onboarding.notifications.title: Never Miss a Prayer
onboarding.notifications.description: Enable notifications to receive timely alerts for daily prayer times, helping you stay connected to your faith.
location.error.load: Failed to load data. Please try again.
location.error.coordinates: Selected city is missing coordinate data.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your prayer reminders and preferences.
settings.notifications.dailyReminders.su: Receive alerts for upcoming prayer times.
settings.notifications.atTime.title: Notify at prayer time
settings.notifications.atTime.subtitle: Receive alerts exactly when the prayer starts.
settings.notifications.before.title: Notify before prayer
settings.notifications.before.subtitle: Get a reminder a few minutes before the prayer begins.
settings.notifications.after.title: Notify after prayer
settings.notifications.after.subtitle: Receive a follow-up reminder after the prayer begins.
settings.notifications.prayerSelection.s: Choose which prayers should trigger notifications.
settings.notifications.tahajjud.title: Tahajjud reminder
settings.notifications.tahajjud.subtitle: Get a nightly alert at your chosen time.
settings.notifications.tahajjud.autoEnab: Tahajjud reminders turn on automatically when you select a time.
settings.prayerTime.twentyFourHour.title: 24-hour clock
settings.language.title: App language
settings.language.subtitle: Switch between available languages.
settings.location.title: Change Location
settings.location.subtitle: Update your city to refresh prayer calculations.
settings.feedback.title: Feedback
settings.feedback.subtitle: Let us know how we can make PrayerTime better.
prayer.title: Prayer Times
prayer.tahajjud.ctaSubtitle: Pick a Tahajjud reminder after Isha.
qibla.title: Qibla Direction
quran.title: Qur'an Explorer
quran.subtitle: Browse popular surahs and continue your daily recitation routine. More content is coming soon.
notifications.permissionDeniedMessage: Please enable notification permissions in system settings to receive prayer reminders.
notifications.exactAlarmPermissionMessag: Prayer reminders need the Alarms & reminders permission so Android can deliver them on time. Grant access from system settings.
tahajjud.notificationsDisabled: Enable prayer notifications to receive Tahajjud reminders.
tahajjud.scheduleFailed: We couldn't schedule the Tahajjud reminder. Please check notification permissions and try again.
tahajjud.picker.title: Select Tahajjud time
tahajjud.picker.description: Choose when you'd like to be reminded for Tahajjud.
tahajjud.locationMissing: Set a location first to calculate Tahajjud times.
tahajjud.timeMissing: Set a reminder time before saving.
